00140 /*extern char pj_hex_digits[];*/
00141 #define pj_hex_digits   "0123456789abcdef"
00142 
00149 PJ_INLINE(void) pj_val_to_hex_digit(unsigned value, char *p)
00150 {
00151     *p++ = pj_hex_digits[ (value & 0xF0) >> 4 ];
00152     *p   = pj_hex_digits[ (value & 0x0F) ];
00153 }
00154 
00160 PJ_INLINE(unsigned) pj_hex_digit_to_val(unsigned char c)
00161 {
00162     if (c <= '9')
00163         return (c-'0') & 0x0F;
00164     else if (c <= 'F')
00165         return  (c-'A'+10) & 0x0F;
00166     else
00167         return (c-'a'+10) & 0x0F;
00168 }
00169 
00172 PJ_END_DECL
